A

ABasicAuthHttpRequestBase - Class in com.shc.ahttp.client.request
The Apache Basic Authentication supporting HTTP Request Base class serves as the base class for any HTTP requestMethods class and contains different methods which utilizes the Apache HTTP client APIs to perform all common tasks related to preparing, sending, HTTP requests as well as receiving and reading HTTP response.

Adds the request timeout to the given HttpRequestBase object by creating a custom instance of RequestConfig and setting the RequestConfig.Builder.setConnectionRequestTimeout(int), RequestConfig.Builder.setConnectionRequestTimeout(int), RequestConfig.Builder.setConnectionRequestTimeout(int)

The Apache HttpGetRequest class facilitates doing a get request to given url and supports Basic Authentication.

B

basicAuthRequired - Variable in class com.shc.ahttp.client.SGetClient
If username, password are not used during the construction of SGetClient object then this value will be set to false, there by skipping basic auth for the request sent.
basicAuthRequired - Variable in class com.shc.ahttp.client.SPostClient
If username, password are not used during the construction of SPostClient object then this value will be set to false, there by skipping basic auth for the request sent.

C

com.shc.ahttp.client - package com.shc.ahttp.client
This package provides clients for making HTTP calls, with support for message converters which can be used to marshal and unmarshal code before and after the HTTP call in a generic way.
com.shc.ahttp.client.exception - package com.shc.ahttp.client.exception
The package encapsulates all exception related classes that will be used to represent various exception states that may happen during the execution of the HTTP client call
com.shc.ahttp.client.messageconverter - package com.shc.ahttp.client.messageconverter
This package contains the message converter contract and various message converters that can be used with SPostClient and SGetClient
com.shc.ahttp.client.request - package com.shc.ahttp.client.request
This class provides the generic request classes for various HTTP operations such as GET, POST using Apache HTTP Client API.
com.shc.ahttp.client.response - package com.shc.ahttp.client.response
The package encapsulates all response related classes that could possibly be returned from the HTTP client call
com.shc.ahttp.client.util - package com.shc.ahttp.client.util
A package of common utility classes used through the API
connectTimeout - Variable in class com.shc.ahttp.client.SGetClient
The connect timeout in milliseconds to be used
connectTimeout - Variable in class com.shc.ahttp.client.SPostClient
The connect timeout in milliseconds to be used

SPostClient<REQ,RES> - Class in com.shc.ahttp.client
A Simple post client, which can be used to post request and receive response, by passing in directly request and response objects, which can be converted using a MessageConverter.
